content: China: 15.9 millions (https://www.globenewswire.com/en/news-release/2022/09/20/2519436/28124/en/China-Console-Games-Market-Report-2022-2026-Increase-in-Spending-to-be-Driven-by-On-going-Sales-of-Nintendo-Switch-Sony-PlayStation-and-Microsoft-Xbox.html). India: same as China. Pakistan: 50 millions.
